name: Shadowkin
default_description: Shadowkin is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends composed of 12 champions

seo.title: %%title%% %%page%% %%sep%% %%parent_title%% %%sep%% %%sitename%%
seo.description: Shadowkin is a faction from RAID Shadow Legends. Find out more on this Raid Shadow Legends codex.

structured_data.description: The Shadowkin hail from the far reaches of the Eastern Continent, beyond the Brimstone Path. Under the brutal heel of the Demonspawn for the past fives centuries, only recently have they cast off Siroth's yoke and rejoined the larger world. Years bent to evil purpose have left a darkness about them, and their fight to regain their lost honor has only just begun.
structured_data.name: Shadowkin

raw_description: The Shadowkin hail from the far reaches of the Eastern Continent, beyond the Brimstone Path. Under the brutal heel of the Demonspawn for the past fives centuries, only recently have they cast off Siroth's yoke and rejoined the larger world.
